scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:server && npm run build:shared && npm run build:client
scripts.build:shared: npm run lint:shared && babel shared --out-dir dist/shared
scripts.build:server: npm run lint:server && babel server --out-dir dist
scripts.build:client: npm run build:client:js && npm run build:client:css && npm run build:client:fonts && npm run build:client:html
scripts.build:client:js: npm run lint:client && mkdir -p dist/public/content/js/ && browserify client/content/js/boot.js > dist/public/content/js/app.js
scripts.lint: npm run lint:shared && npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.watch:client: npm run watch:client:js && npm run watch:client:css
scripts.watch:server: nodemon --watch shared --watch server --ext js --exec 'npm run build:shared && npm run build:server && node dist/server'
scripts.watch: npm run watch:server & npm run watch:client
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build:client && NODE_ENV=development NOBLE_REPORT_ALL_HCI_EVENTS=1 npm run watch
